about_the_game:
2018.
A secret organization built a complex for space exploration, also for experiments - the transformation from people into robots, for military purposes.
Strange meteorites fell to the ground, they had no idea what was inside.
2019.
The virus, which was in meteorites, took control of the mind and body of almost all people.
But worst of all, they could control robots.

It won't let me die...



Robotization: The Last Human - a first person survival horror. Be afraid of unknown creatures, losing all hope of salvation..
Survive in this scary world, where you are alone...

Learn the story of Alex - the character you will play as. Lose sanity, forget everything and remember everything. Explore a variety of locations, complete a variety of tasks, solve puzzles.
You survived for a reason, someone or something wanted it. Someone or something wanted to destroy humans.

Gameplay


Sanity
Alex, seeing terrible things, will gradually go crazy, sometimes saying strange phrases. If you don't want to faint, you shouldn't look at enemies often, they can hear you.

Stealth, Hide and Seek, Chases, Various Enemies.
There are various enemies in the game, to which you need to apply different approaches in order not to die.
Do not try to catch the eye of enemies if you do not want to die
If you are spotted, try to run away while remembering to block the doors, you might get lucky...
If you hide in the dark, there will be a blue glow around you, enemies won't see you unless they get close. However, in the dark, you can try to hide from them if you sit still and also don't look at them.

Interaction with objects
In the game, you can take, carry, rotate different objects. With these objects, you can distract the enemy, block the door, or build a ladder to climb somewhere.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains scenes with dismemberment of the head (from first person),
dismembered bodies, meat, and blood.
